Title: Relates to the no fare program for transportation on the Long Island Rail Road for certain detective investigators or rackets investigators for the Nassau county district attorney
Summary: Adds to the no fare program for transportation on the Long Island Rail Road certain detective investigators or rackets investigators employed by the Nassau county district attorney.
LawCode: Amd ยง1266, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the no fare program for transportation on the Long Island Rail Road for certain detective investigators or rackets investigators
